name: Acrophile
description:
There's an island in the Atlantic Ocean that doesn't show up on maps. A constant storm guards it from outsiders, and makes it impossible to tell day from night. There are rumours of an uncontacted tribe on the island... the discovery of a lifetime. Brought to you by PORTAL emulator. 

A short first-person 2D point & click pixel style horror game. Playtime is ~30min. Warning: contains body horror.

Headphones recommended. Windows build only (sorry - might make a Mac/Linux build in the future). No save system - must be played in one sitting. Enjoy!
